pages.text: Curious puffballs known as $(thing)Sheepuffs$() roam the $(thing)Aether$(). Similar to regular $(thing)Sheep$(), these can be encountered in a variety of colours. More curiously, they tend to suddenly jump quite high in a puff of air, then slowly float down.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Sheepuff$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience. They can be led, and bred using $(item)Blue Berries$().
